title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Classic Halloween Themed Modes
content: Los Santos is embracing the occult as evil forces begin to wreak havoc. Go head-to-head with villainous characters and earn Double Rewards in Halloween-themed Adversary and Survival modes, including Condemned and Alien Survivals â€” plus Triple Rewards on Judgement Day.
